title: Privacy, Tech, Policy, Law
description: This course takes a multi-disciplinary approach to privacy, a topic of great interest in the technology, policy, ethics and law business realms.  Credit will not be awarded for more than one of PUBP 4726, MGT 4726, MGT 6726, CS 4726 OR CS 6726.
